Designers transform jpg to vector to eliminate this issue. Vector graphics outlets the styles, line and shade that make up an image as a mathematical formula. This indicates that considering that the vector program recreates the image utilizing mathematical formulae, it can scale the picture to any dimensions as lengthy as the monitor resolution permits it.
